contentencoded:
A siege on a mall in Nairobi, Kenya is now entering its third day. Dozens are dead and many more are wounded as government forces remain in a standoff with gunmen stationed inside with hostages. 

Neelam Verjee, global business reporter based in Nairobi, joins Marketplace Morning Report host Mark Garrison to discuss the latest details on the standoff and the long-term impact these events will have for the Kenyan people. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
